Articles.Content:
I crush you with an osmium asteroid.

I dont lift it. My hill.

They arrest you for the undeclared import of precious metals.

Currently you don't care about that hill.

I am incapable of apathy. Try again.

My hill.

I plant my flag on the hill and claim it for all kerbalkind. 

My shared hill.

I join you on the hill.

Our hill

Due to an engine change, all vessels (including flags) are removed.

My unclaimed, but now claimed hill.

Due to a backup being found, everything is reinstated. 

This is now my hill

I build a huge hill and invite everyone.

everyone's hill

That sounds like communism.

Twentieth-century America's hill now.
OK, XX-century United Socialist States (USSA) hill.

I use a capitalist bomb. My rich hill.

[https://youtu.be/U06jlgpMtQs](https://youtu.be/U06jlgpMtQs)

Links do not have any power here. 

I delete the link; my hill.

I delete the kraken

My hill

A new game update revives Kraken. Again.

A krakenized hill.

I hit the hill with an asteroid that has 4 halleys strapped onto it.

My hole to hell.

TBH I don't think that as long as i'm alive the Kraken will not leave. Deleting the kraken will momentarily neutralize my powers, but I'll be back stronger.

I summon the Kraken out of a lava lake and it reaches up through the hole and drags you into hell, which judging by your profile pic, and the rest of your profile, is perfectly fine.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-11-21T01:21:46Z" title="11/21/2018 01:21  AM" data-short="5 yr">November 21, 2018</time> by Kernel Kraken**

After I disengage the physics engine, the kraken is rendered incompetent. Also, because the physics engine is now gone, all activity stops.

My snow-globe universe.
It melts. A water-drop universe.

It gives gaseous state a miss and goes straight to plasma.

My kind of sort of proto plasma droplet universe.

It ignites and becomes a star. all of you burn, while I escape from hell and make a hill on a new protoplanet orbiting the hill-star.

My Protohill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-11-22T00:56:33Z" title="11/22/2018 12:56  AM" data-short="5 yr">November 22, 2018</time> by Fraston**

A hot Jupiter passes by and dispels the protoplanet with the protohill.

A protocloud.
The ptorocloud condensed. My cloud.
A frozen ball with no hills.

![130809890.jpg](https://autoweek.com/sites/default/files/styles/gen-932-524/public/130809890.jpg)

Conquered your ball, [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/), with one of my flagship weapons, an air raid siren (You guys already know who made this and what's the model) with heaters equipped to avoid freezing. It's now mine.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-11-26T12:56:18Z" title="11/26/2018 12:56  PM" data-short="5 yr">November 26, 2018</time> by FahmiRBLXian**

Sorry bud, but your puny air raid siren can't stand the might of [Canadian engineering!](https://www.google.ca/search?biw=1920&bih=931&tbm=isch&sa=1&ei=dgv-W9quGZ-t0PEPid6P0A0&q=canadian+churchill+tank&oq=canadian+churchill+tank&gs_l=img.3..0.7595.12984..13182...5.0..0.79.1267.19......1....1..gws-wiz-img.......0i8i30j0i24.v3OxxfYBsR8#imgrc=fO8gn1GTpGaohM:)

The hill is now my winter wonderland with fortifications added to make the Maginot line cry to it's mama out of insecurity.
